title: [Concept] Void Janna
body:
https://33.media.tumblr.com/d63a4e7c8e301b210ab791325c212f81/tumblr_ndjp1vPFEA1sdqpmho1_500.png
I found that accidently on google when I was looking for Kalista. Isn't that great? I'd buy it. Janna is too gentle for me, I'd love to see her not only as angel, but as half-angel half-demon as well. ;)

replies.body: i must say that that i would love to see this void theme on nami {{champion:267}} . that would be cool, just imagine 3 voidlings on her Joke {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}}

> i must say that that i would love to see this void theme on nami {{champion:267}} . that would be cool, just imagine 3 voidlings on her Joke {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}}

YES. YES. YES.

> > i must say that that i would love to see this void theme on nami {{champion:267}} . that would be cool, just imagine 3 voidlings on her Joke {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}} {{item:3422}}
> 
> YES. YES. YES.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=753529&d=1376080244
http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/013/1/9/skin_abyssal_queen_nami_by_veganya-d721efm.jpg

These are great ideas that could be turned into Void Nami. ^^

The voidlings; the void theme spell effecs in her abilities; replacing her mermaid fin and hair with tentacles would make a great skin for nami{{champion:267}} , you would just see her in game floting around with her tentacles just like velcoz. {{champion:161}} so cool.

In the harrowing video, when the shadow isles mist waved its way through the ocean, I thought about Nami! I was like there's no other champion that can summon waves other than Nami. So... maybe a Shadow Isles Nami themed skin?

> In the harrowing video, when the shadow isles mist waved its way through the ocean, I thought about Nami! I was like there's no other champion that can summon waves other than Nami. So... maybe a Shadow Isles Nami themed skin?

Shadow Isles Nami confirmed.
We have a Rioter, ladies n gents. Void Janna confirmed. XD
i'm happy now,  Riot notice me :3 {{summoner:10}}
There are too many Janna skins...
There are never enough Janna skins. I own all of them (except victorious) and I still don't have enough Janna skins :C
void nidalee would be badass to see.
I love Janna and I would totally get that.

What Cheatin Husband (great name btw) is saying is that, there should be other champs for skin priority. For instance, skarner and trundle are FINALLY getting new skins. There are also many other champs that need new skins, because they barely have any or haven't had a new one in over 2 years. 

I practically main janna, btw, so yes I would still buy this skin. However, I would much rather other champs get some love first.

2 looks the same (Tempest and Frost Queen), one is Hextech, one isn't normal skin (1820RP) and there are 2 unavailable. So we have 3 normal skins, 2 different, but non is dark. We need differences! ;)
